book.synopsis: Modeled after The Wizard of Oz, this enchanting story describes a young giraffe who suffers from a fear of heights. On his way to the doctor, he befriends a monkey who is afraid of climbing and a hippo who is a afraid of water. What causes the three new friends to face and overcome their fears? The “For Creative Minds” section includes fun facts and animal adaptation information, as well as a “Match the Feet” game and a mix-and-match activity. Encourages children to overcome their fears and to help friends in trouble.
book.title_long: The Giraffe Who Was Afraid of Heights (Arbordale Collection)
book.dimensions: Height: 10.28 Inches, Length: 8.82 Inches, Weight: 0.91 Pounds, Width: 0.47 Inches
